footer.delete_these_items: Please confirm your changes to the following object id
footer.hibp_nok: Matched! This is a potentially dangerous password!
footer.restart_container_info: Important: A graceful restart may take a while to complete, please wait for it to finish.
footer.restarting_container: Restarting container, this may take a while

login.mobileconfig_info: Please login as mailbox user to download the requested Apple connection profile.

quarantine.confirm_delete: Confirm the deletion of this element.
quarantine.disabled_by_config: The current system configuration disables the quarantine functionality. Please set "retentions per mailbox" and a "maximum size" for quarantine elements.
quarantine.qhandler_success: Request successfully sent to the system. You can now close the window.
quarantine.qinfo:
The quarantine system will save rejected mail to the database, while the sender will not be given the impression of a delivered mail.
"Learn as spam and delete" will learn a message as spam via Bayesian theorem and also calculate fuzzy hashes to deny similar messages in the future.
Please be aware that learning multiple messages can be - depending on your system - time consuming.
Blacklisted elements are excluded from the quarantine.
quarantine.release_body: We have attached your message as eml file to this message.

user.direct_aliases_desc: Direct alias addresses are affected by spam filter and TLS policy settings.
user.eas_reset_help:
In many cases a device cache reset will help to recover a broken ActiveSync profile.
Attention: All elements will be redownloaded!
user.force_pw_update: You must set a new password to be able to access groupware related services.
user.new_password_description: Requirement: 6 characters long, letters and numbers.
user.pushover_info: Push notification settings will apply to all clean (non-spam) mail delivered to %s including aliases (shared, non-shared, tagged).
user.pushover_sender_array: Consider the following sender email addresses <small>(comma-separated)</small>
user.pushover_sender_regex: Match senders by the following regex
user.pushover_vars:
When no sender filter is defined, all mails will be considered.
Regex filters as well as exact sender checks can be defined individually and will be considered sequentially. They do not depend on each other.
Useable variables for text and title (please take note of data protection policies)
user.quarantine_notification_info: Once a notification has been sent, items will be marked as "notified" and no further notifications will be sent for this particular item.
user.shared_aliases_desc: Shared aliases are not affected by user specific settings such as the spam filter or encryption policy. Corresponding spam filters can only be made by an administrator as a domain-wide policy.
user.sogo_profile_reset_help: This will destroy a users SOGo profile and delete all contact and calendar data irretrievable.
user.spamfilter_bl_desc: Blacklisted email addresses to always classify as spam and reject. Wildcards may be used. A filter is only applied to direct aliases (aliases with a single target mailbox) excluding catch-all aliases and a mailbox itself.
user.spamfilter_green: Green: this message is not spam
user.spamfilter_hint: The first value describes the "low spam score", the second represents the "high spam score".
user.spamfilter_red: Red: This message is spam and will be rejected by the server
user.spamfilter_wl_desc: Whitelisted email addresses to never classify as spam. Wildcards may be used. A filter is only applied to direct aliases (aliases with a single target mailbox) excluding catch-all aliases and a mailbox itself.
user.spamfilter_yellow: Yellow: this message may be spam, will be tagged as spam and moved to your junk folder
user.tag_help_example: Example for a tagged email address: me+Facebook@example.org
user.tag_help_explain:
In subfolder: a new subfolder named after the tag will be created below INBOX ("INBOX/Facebook").
In subject: the tags name will be prepended to the mails subject, example: "[Facebook] My News".
user.title: Title
user.tls_policy_warning:
Warning: If you decide to enforce encrypted mail transfer, you may lose emails.
Messages to not satisfy the policy will be bounced with a hard fail by the mail system.
This option applies to your primary email address (login name), all addresses derived from alias domains as well as alias addresses with only this single mailbox as target.
